Name: Unlight:SchizoChronicle
About the game: 'Unlight:SchizoChronicle' is a real time deck building game. Every turn each player purchases cards and fights against monsters. If you purchase a card, if that card gets added to your deck and you win the battle with the monster you get a 'sherd point'. Strategically build and strengthen the deck and earn more 'shade points' than other players!
